text: Śląsk Wrocław or simply Śląsk is a Polish football club from Wrocław which plays in Ekstraklasa. The club was founded in 1947. In 1977, Śląsk Wrocław won the Polish league championship for the first time. They also won the Polish Cup twice, the Polish Super Cup twice and the Ekstraklasa Cup once. Their home stadium is Stadion Wrocław. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1940s establishments in Poland Category:1947 establishments in Europe Category:Polish football clubs Category:Wrocław
title: Śląsk Wrocław
